Hello LET members,

Parkinhost.com is pleased to offer our Dual-Core G530 Dedicated Server in Frankfurt, Germany. Please contact our sales department with any questions prior to ordering.

**Dual-Core G530 Dedicated Server**

Dedicated RAM : 2GB DDR3

HDD Space : 2x500GB

IP : 1

Bandwidth : Unmetered

Network Line : 100Mbps Speed
Hosted in  Germany (Frankfurt)  Datacenter
 
Test IP : 37.58.58.140 | Setup : 24 – 120 Working Hours

**Price : $43.73/mo.**

[CLICK HERE TO ORDER NOW!](http://www.parkinhost.com/germany-server.php)


FAQ

Q. How long have you been in Business ?
Ans. We have been providing Web hosting services since December 2013

Q. Do you offer a money-back guarantee? What are the conditions for eligibility ?
Ans. We have a 15 Day Unconditional Money Back Guarantee!

Q. What methods do you accept for payment?
Ans. Currently we accept payments made via Direct Credit Card Processing and Paypal
2Checkout
Paypal - VISA, MC, Am. Express, VISA/MC debit cards, bank transfer, eCheck, Paypal balance.
Skrill (MoneyBookers) - Skrill Balances.
Perfect Money

Q. Are you a Reseller ?
Ans. No, we're not a reseller, we have root access to and manage our own servers.

Q. Can I ping one of your servers?
Ans. Yes, we allow sites to have commercial advertisements.

Check our [Terms of Service](http://www.parkinhost.com/termsofservice.php) and [Privacy policy](http://www.parkinhost.com/privacypolicy.php) before you order.

Thank you

Regards

[ParkInHost](http://www.parkinhost.com)
